002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
005
006import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
007import com.commercetools.api.models.customer_group.CustomerGroup;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.customer_group.CustomerGroupDraft;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.customer_group.CustomerGroupDraftBuilder;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.customer_group.CustomerGroupUpdate;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.customer_group.CustomerGroupUpdateAction;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.customer_group.CustomerGroupUpdateActionBuilder;
013
014public interface ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsRequestBuilderMixin {
015    public ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
016
017    public ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsPost post(CustomerGroupDraft customerDraft);
018
019    public default ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsByIDPost update(Versioned<CustomerGroup> customerGroup,
020            java.util.List<CustomerGroupUpdateAction> actions) {
021        return withId(customerGroup.getId())
022                .post(builder -> CustomerGroupUpdate.builder().version(customerGroup.getVersion()).actions(actions));
023    }
024
025    public default ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsByIDPost update(Versioned<CustomerGroup> customerGroup,
026            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<CustomerGroupUpdateAction, CustomerGroupUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
027        return withId(customerGroup.getId()).post(builder -> CustomerGroupUpdate.builder()
028                .version(customerGroup.getVersion())
029                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(CustomerGroupUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
030    }
031
032    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<CustomerGroupUpdateAction, CustomerGroupUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsByIDPost> update(
033            Versioned<CustomerGroup> customerGroup) {
034        return builder -> withId(customerGroup.getId()).post(b -> CustomerGroupUpdate.builder()
035                .version(customerGroup.getVersion())
036                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(CustomerGroupUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
037    }
038
039    public default ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsByIDDelete delete(Versioned<CustomerGroup> customerGroup) {
040        return withId(customerGroup.getId()).delete().withVersion(customerGroup.getVersion());
041    }
042
043    public default ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsPost create(CustomerGroupDraft customerGroupDraft) {
044        return post(customerGroupDraft);
045    }
046
047    public default ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsPost create(UnaryOperator<CustomerGroupDraftBuilder> op) {
048        return post(op.apply(CustomerGroupDraftBuilder.of()).build());
049    }
050}
